patthana12.1:5.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:6.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana12.1:7.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. #1
patthana12.1:8.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana12.1:9.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … nakamme ekaṃ … pe … naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana12.1:11.1: Nanahetu nasahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana12.1:12.1: Nahetu nasahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana12.1:12.2: Nahetu nasahetuko dhammo nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana12.1:13.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe cattāri, anantare cattāri … pe … sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme … pe … jhāne ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana12.1:14.1: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:14.2: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:14.3: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko ca nanahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana12.1:15.1: Nanahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:15.2: Nanahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:15.3: Nanahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko ca nanahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana12.1:16.1: Nahetuṃ naahetukañca nanahetuṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:16.2: Nahetuṃ naahetukañca nanahetuṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:16.3: Nahetuṃ naahetukañca nanahetuṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko ca nanahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:17.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana12.1:18.1: Nahetuṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana12.1:19.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana12.1:20.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana12.1:21.1: Nanahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana12.1:22.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttañca nanahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana12.1:24.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:25.1: Nanahetuṃ naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:26.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:27.1: Nanahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttañceva nana ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto ceva nana ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:28.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.1:29.1: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
